home.title: AI-Powered Plant Intelligence
home.subtitle: Revolutionary plant care platform combining computer vision, predictive analytics, and machine learning to create the ultimate gardening experience.

aiIntelligence.title: AI Plant Intelligence
aiIntelligence.description: Advanced machine learning algorithms analyze your plants and provide personalized care recommendations

computerVision.title: Computer Vision Analysis
computerVision.description: Instantly identify plants and diagnose health issues using cutting-edge image recognition technology

predictiveCare.title: Predictive Care System
predictiveCare.description: Smart algorithms predict your plants' needs before problems arise, ensuring optimal health

automatedMonitoring.title: Automated Monitoring
automatedMonitoring.description: Real-time health monitoring with instant alerts and automated care recommendations

capabilities.title: Intelligent Plant Care
capabilities.subtitle: Experience the future of gardening with our advanced AI systems that understand, predict, and optimize every aspect of plant care.

plantDiagnosis.title: Plant Health Diagnosis
plantDiagnosis.description: Upload a photo and get instant AI-powered health analysis with treatment recommendations

predictiveAlerts.title: Predictive Care Alerts
predictiveAlerts.description: AI predicts when your plants need water, fertilizer, or attention before problems occur

gardenPlanning.title: Smart Garden Planning
gardenPlanning.description: AI designs optimal garden layouts based on your space, climate, and preferences

cta.title: Ready for the Future of Gardening?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of gardeners who are already experiencing the power of AI-driven plant care.

dashboard.title: AI Dashboard
dashboard.welcome: Welcome back, {{name}}! Your AI assistant has been monitoring your garden.
dashboard.signInRequired: Sign in to view your dashboard

plants.title: Plant Database
plants.subtitle: Explore our AI-curated collection of plants
plants.searchPlaceholder: Search plants by name, features, or care needs...
plants.noResultsMessage: No plants match your search for "{{query}}". Try different keywords or adjust your filters.
plants.startExploringMessage: Use the search bar or filters to discover plants that match your needs.

aiSchedule.title: AI Care Schedule
aiSchedule.description: Our AI has analyzed this plant species and created a personalized care schedule optimized for your environment and experience level.

growthForecast.title: AI Growth Prediction
growthForecast.description: Our predictive AI model forecasts how your plant will develop over time based on species data, your care patterns, and environmental conditions.

troubleshootingGuide.title: AI Troubleshooting
troubleshootingGuide.description: Our AI has identified common issues for this plant species and provided solutions based on scientific research and expert knowledge.

aiAssistant.title: AI Plant Intelligence
aiAssistant.subtitle: Advanced machine learning and computer vision to solve any plant problem

predictiveIntelligence.description: AI predicts plant needs before problems occur

smartAutomation.title: Smart Automation

accountSettings.title: Account Settings
accountSettings.bioPlaceholder: Tell us about yourself and your gardening experience...

notificationPreferences.title: Notification Preferences
notificationPreferences.careRemindersDesc: Receive notifications for watering, fertilizing, and other care tasks
notificationPreferences.aiInsightsDesc: Get notified about AI-generated insights and predictions
notificationPreferences.communityActivityDesc: Notifications about comments, likes, and mentions
notificationPreferences.marketingEmailsDesc: Receive updates about new features and promotions

privacySettings.title: Privacy Settings
privacySettings.shareGardenDataDesc: Allow anonymous sharing of your garden data to improve AI recommendations
privacySettings.publicProfileDesc: Make your profile and garden visible to other users
privacySettings.allowDataAnalysisDesc: Let our AI analyze your garden data to provide personalized insights
privacySettings.locationSharingDesc: Share your location for climate-specific recommendations

aiConfiguration.title: AI Configuration
aiConfiguration.aiDescription: Configure how our advanced AI interacts with your garden data to provide personalized insights and recommendations.
aiConfiguration.enablePredictionsDesc: Allow AI to predict plant needs and growth patterns
aiConfiguration.dataCollectionDesc: Collect plant data to improve AI model accuracy
aiConfiguration.automatedCareDesc: Allow AI to automatically adjust care schedules based on plant needs
aiConfiguration.advancedAnalyticsDesc: Enable deep learning analysis of your garden performance
aiConfiguration.personalizedRecommendationsDesc: Receive AI-tailored plant and care recommendations

appearanceSettings.title: Appearance Settings
appearanceSettings.compactModeDesc: Display more content with reduced spacing

auth.signInSubtitle: Sign in to your AI garden
auth.demoDescription: This is a demo version. You can use any email and password to explore the platform.
auth.demoCredentials: Demo credentials: Any email/password combination will work

errors.errorDescription: We encountered an unexpected error. Don't worry, our AI is learning from this to prevent future issues.
